message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $18,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm a serious buyer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your budget considerations, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $15,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $10,500. Can we meet in the middle of that?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  While I'm motivated to sell, I can't go as low as $10,500.  Would you consider $13,000?  This feels like a fair compromise.
I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but I really need to stay within my budget. Can we meet at $12,500?
